title: Children of Brunei
creator_credit: Gibson Film Productions, Radio Television Brunei, Dave Gibson and Yvonne MacKay
brief_description: The film shows the life of two children in Brunei at school, reading the Koran, working at the markets, fishing and attending a wedding procession, emphasising the Muslim observance of religious ceremonies. Brunei is one of the last remaining monarchies in the world. Suitable for upper primary level.
